description: Failed adverse possession - just under statutory period
facts: Karen has occupied the property for 19 years and 11 months
Her possession has been continuous, open, and hostile
She has paid all property taxes
The owner has now filed to eject her
asp_facts: claim(c10). claimant(c10, karen). property_type(c10, land). occupation_years(c10, 19). occupation_continuous(c10, yes). occupation_open(c10, yes). occupation_hostile(c10, yes). taxes_paid(c10, yes). statutory_period(c10, 20).
question: Has Karen acquired title through adverse possession?
rationale: Although Karen meets all other requirements, she has only occupied for 19 years, which is less than the 20-year statutory period. The owner can still eject her before she completes the required period.
